Title: RTF 2 .NET
Description: This is a small application which allows you to take an RTF file and parse it into code that you can use in a .NET project as the control's RTF property.  Basically it simply displays the RTF code as plain text.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This is a small application which allows you to take an RTF file and parse it into code that you can use in a .NET project as the control's RTF property. Basically it simply displays the RTF code as plain text.

I am in the process of commenting the source code. It should be updated shortly.
